title: DJI Osmo Pocket 3: my favorite gadget of the year
description: The Osmo Pocket 3, a small handheld gimbal with a camera from DJI, comes with a larger 1-inch CMOS sensor, longer battery, and plenty of new tricks. After more than 2 months of testing and over 600 video clips later, the Osmo Pocket 3 slowly became one of my favorite gadgets this year. #Technology #Camera #Videography   0:00 Introduction  0:59 Image quality and performance  1:40 Who is this for? Vloggers? Videographers?  2:07 Low light mode  2:33 Glamour mode filters (Demo) 3:20 Screen quality and UX 3:53 Vertical mode 4:26 Photos with Osmo Pocket 3 5:00 Creators Bundle,  5:27 Battery life 5:45 Active Track  6:21 Mimo App  6:39 Osmo Pocket 3 as webcam  6:58 Software updates (120fps) 7:18 Boot up time, Digital Zoom  7:46 Why do I love it so much?
